# this is the build file for project 
# it is autogenerated by the xmake build system.
# do not edit by hand.

# project
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.15.0)
cmake_policy(SET CMP0091 NEW)
project(parser LANGUAGES CXX)

add_definitions(-DPROJECT_ROOT="${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}")

# target
add_executable(parser "")
set_target_properties(parser PROPERTIES OUTPUT_NAME "parser")
set_target_properties(parser PROPERTIES RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/linux/x86_64/release")
target_include_directories(parser PRIVATE
    include
)
target_compile_options(parser PRIVATE
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-m64>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-m64>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-DNDEBUG>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-DNDEBUG>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CUDA>:-DNDEBUG>
)
set_target_properties(parser PROPERTIES CXX_EXTENSIONS OFF)
target_compile_features(parser PRIVATE cxx_std_17)
if(MSVC)
    target_compile_options(parser PRIVATE $<$<CONFIG:Release>:-O2>)
else()
    target_compile_options(parser PRIVATE -O3)
endif()
if(MSVC)
else()
    target_compile_options(parser PRIVATE -fvisibility=hidden)
endif()
if(MSVC)
    set_property(TARGET parser PROPERTY
        MSVC_RUNTIME_LIBRARY "MultiThreaded$<$<CONFIG:Debug>:Debug>")
endif()
target_link_options(parser PRIVATE
    -m64
)
target_sources(parser PRIVATE
    src/main.cpp
    src/print.cpp
    src/LL1Parser.cpp
    src/read.cpp
)
